amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 123 regarding icebreaker vessels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-217 to strike section 123 regarding icebreaker vessels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 220 (Roll no. 366).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
